emissions.closest_match_explanation: Matched '1 small onion' to 'onion, raw' as it is the least processed option available for onions.
Matched '0.5 red pepper' to 'pepper, sweet, red, raw' as it is the most appropriate match for a raw red pepper.
Matched '250 g beef' to 'average beef' as it is the most general and relevant option for beef.
Matched '1 can kidney beans' to 'kidney beans' as it is the exact match for canned kidney beans.
Matched '2.5 dl beef stock' to 'bouillon, beef, prepared' as it is the least processed option available for beef stock.
Matched '10-12 small corn tortillas' to 'tortilla bread, wheat' as it is the most relevant option for tortillas.
Matched '1 portion of tomato salsa' to 'salsa, hot' as it is the most relevant option for salsa.
Matched '1 avocado' to 'avocado, raw' as it is the exact match for a raw avocado.
Matched '0.5 red onion' to 'red onion' as it is the most appropriate match for a raw red onion.
Matched '300 g tomatoes' to 'tomato, peeled, canned' as it is the most relevant option for canned tomatoes.
